name: Tick tock (Mandytoh)
description:
A little narrative game about death. You play a very old man who can die every minute. You have to remember his life byinteracting with objects to prolong your life time.

Edit #1 : It’s only a “waiting death” experience with remember parts of life by clicking. You can’t win, or lose, only prolong your life and delay the inevitable :clock2:

Gameplay
  • You can click on things to remember.
  • You have 90 seconds to do this.
  • Moving “enlarge” time too
  • Special feature : it’s the real time (check your watch o clock) when start game or level
Controls
  • Only Keyboard & Mouse
  • Click on the floor to move or on furniture to move and speak.
Bugs
  • You can move before wakeup…
  • Last end fade out is too long…
  • Perheaps lags ?
Comments

48 hours is so hard but so fun ! It was a very cool experience with a good theme.
I made all of this game and I record parts of it on my twitch channel, if you want !
Have fun with a classical piano music and tick tock background !

Information:

I reupload my game because I only modified its name (I'm french and a little dumb.. I wrote "tik tok" instead of "tick tock")
You can compare between the two project sources, nothing more is modified
